verses.text: \w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, Esther \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w robes|strong="H4438"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w across|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w quarters|strong="H1004"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* courtroom, \w facing|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w soon|strong="H7126"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, she \w found|strong="H5375"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w extended|strong="H3447"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w scepter|strong="H8275"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w toward|strong="H3027"\w* Esther, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* she \w approached|strong="H7126"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* tip \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w scepter|strong="H8275"\w*.

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther?” \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* inquired. “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w*? \w Even|strong="H5704"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*.”

“If \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w pleases|strong="H2895"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*,” Esther replied, “\w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* come \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.”

“\w Hurry|strong="H4116"\w*,” commanded \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w bring|strong="H6213"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* Esther \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w requested|strong="H1697"\w*.” \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* Esther \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w drank|strong="H4960"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Esther, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w petition|strong="H7596"\w*? \w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*. \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w*? \w Even|strong="H5704"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="H6213"\w*.”
Esther \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “This is \w my|strong="H6030"\w* \w petition|strong="H7596"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w my|strong="H6030"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w*:

If \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* if \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w pleases|strong="H2895"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w petition|strong="H7596"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w*, \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w come|strong="H4279"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. \w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w answer|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w question|strong="H1697"\w*.”

\w That|strong="H7200"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w glad|strong="H8056"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*. \w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, however, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w tremble|strong="H2111"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* fear \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w*. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w rage|strong="H2534"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*.

Nevertheless, \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* restrained himself \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w went|strong="H1004"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*. \w And|strong="H7971"\w* calling \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* friends \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* wife \w Zeresh|strong="H2238"\w*,

\w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w recounted|strong="H5608"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w* \w wealth|strong="H6239"\w*, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ways \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w honored|strong="H3519"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w promoted|strong="H1431"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.

“\w What|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w*,” \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* added, “\w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther \w invited|strong="H7121"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w join|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w invited|strong="H7121"\w* back \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w along|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3605"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* satisfies \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w as|strong="H3427"\w* \w long|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H3427"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.”

\w His|strong="H3605"\w* wife \w Zeresh|strong="H2238"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* friends \w told|strong="H1697"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w Have|strong="H1697"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w build|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* cubits \w high|strong="H1364"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w ask|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w go|strong="H3190"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* enjoy \w yourself|strong="H6213"\w*.” \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w advice|strong="H1697"\w* \w pleased|strong="H3190"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w* \w constructed|strong="H6213"\w*.
